targets.rawSql: SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "success_95th_resp_time" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'http_req_duration'   AND (tags->>'status')::integer < 400   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   SUM(value) AS "reqs_per_sec" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'http_reqs'   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   MAX(value) AS "vus" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'vus'   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT   1 AS "time",   SUM(value) FROM   samples WHERE   metric = 'http_reqs'   AND (tags->>'status')::int >= 400   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT   1 AS "time",   SUM(value) FROM   samples WHERE   metric = 'http_reqs'   AND (tags->>'error_code')::int >= 1000   AND (tags->>'error_code')::int <= 1399   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

panels.description: The 95th percentile response time of the target system, with success responses separated from error responses.

targets.rawSql: SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "successful" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'http_req_duration'   AND (tags->>'status')::integer < 400   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "failed" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'http_req_duration'   AND (tags->>'status')::integer >= 400   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

panels.title: Response time (95th percentile)

panels.description: Request rate, with successful responses separated from failed ones.

targets.rawSql: SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   SUM(value) AS "reqs_per_sec" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'http_reqs'   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   MAX(value) AS "vus" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'vus'   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

panels.title: Throughput

targets.rawSql: SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   SUM(CASE WHEN (tags->>'status')::int >= 400 THEN value ELSE 0 END)::real / SUM(value)::real * 100.0 AS "http_failure_rate" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'http_reqs'   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   CASE WHEN COUNT(value) > 0 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN value = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::real / COUNT(value)::real * 100.0 ELSE 0 END AS "check_failure_rate" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'checks'   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT   CASE WHEN "tags" IS NULL THEN "metric" ELSE "metric" || '{' || (SELECT key || ':' || value FROM jsonb_each_text("tags")) || '}' END,   "threshold",   CASE WHEN "last_failed" THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS pass_fail FROM   thresholds WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts) ORDER BY 3 ASC LIMIT 100

SELECT   tags->>'check' AS "check",   SUM(CASE WHEN value = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "successful",   SUM(CASE WHEN value = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "failed",   CASE WHEN COUNT(value) > 0 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN value = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::real / COUNT(value)::real * 100.0 ELSE 0 END AS "failure_rate" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'checks'   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 4 DESC LIMIT 100

value.title: Click to open $__cell in new tab

targets.rawSql:
SELECT   tags->>'url' AS "URL",   
    tags->>'method' AS "method",   
    CASE      WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int >= 1000 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int <= 1099 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (General)'     WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int = 1101 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (DNS no such host)'     WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int = 1110 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (DNS blacklisted IP)'     WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int >= 1100 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int <= 1199 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (DNS)'     WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int = 1211 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (TCP connection timeout)'     WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int = 1212 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (TCP connection refused)'     WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int = 1213 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (TCP connection error)'     WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int >= 1200 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int <= 1299 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (TCP)'     WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int = 1311 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (TLS cert not matching hostname)'     WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int >= 1300 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int <= 1399 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (TLS)'     WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int >= 1600 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int <= 1699 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (HTTP/2)'     WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 THEN tags->>'error_code'     ELSE tags->>'status'   END AS "status",   
    COUNT(*) AS count,   
    percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "95th",   
    percentile_cont(0.99) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "99th",   
    MAX(value) AS "max",
    AVG(value) AS "avg" 
    FROM   samples 
    WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   
    AND metric = 'http_req_duration'   
    AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) 
    GROUP BY 1, 2, 3 
    ORDER BY 6 
    DESC LIMIT 100

panels.description: Breakdown of response time into its constituent parts.

targets.rawSql: SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "blocked" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'http_req_blocked'   AND (tags->>'status')::integer < 400   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "connecting" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'http_req_connecting'   AND (tags->>'status')::integer < 400   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "tls_handshake" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'http_req_tls_handshaking'   AND (tags->>'status')::integer < 400   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "sending" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'http_req_sending'   AND (tags->>'status')::integer < 400   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "waiting" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'http_req_waiting'   AND (tags->>'status')::integer < 400   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "receiving" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'http_req_receiving'   AND (tags->>'status')::integer < 400   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

panels.title: Response beakdown (95th percentile)

panels.description: Data sent and received per second.

targets.rawSql: SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   SUM(value) AS "data_sent" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'data_sent'   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT   date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",   SUM(value) AS "data_received" FROM   samples WHERE   $__timeFilter(ts)   AND metric = 'data_received'   AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

panels.title: Data transfer

list.label: Test ID
list.name: testid
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT tags->>'testid' AS "id" FROM samples WHERE metric = 'vus';
